# White Eagles & Co. - Comprehensive Knowledge Base

> **Date Updated**: January 2026
> **Location**: Bratislava, Slovakia
> **Contact**: welcome@whiteeagles.sk | +421 950 347 163
> **Website**: https://whiteeagles.sk

---

## 1. Company Overview

White Eagles & Co. is a premium digital agency based in Slovakia, specializing in **Web Development**, **Digital Marketing**, and **Business Automation**.

### Philosophy
We solve business problems, not just write code. Our key differentiator is **"No Complex Specs Required"**. We understand that business owners shouldn't need to write 50-page technical documents. We take the lead, proposing the best solutions based on a brief discussion of your goals.

### Technology Stack
- **Frontend**: React, TypeScript, Vite, Modern CSS3 (responsive flex/grid layouts).
- **Backend & Automation**: Python, PHP.
- **CMS**: Custom solutions, WordPress (for specific legacy needs).
- **Analytics**: Google Analytics 4 (Server-side), Google Tag Manager, Microsoft Clarity.

---

## 2. Detailed Service Offerings

### A. Web Development
*URL: /service/webdev*

We build high-performance, SEO-ready websites tailored to the Slovak market.
- **Types**: Corporate websites, Landing pages, E-commerce, Booking systems.
- **Key Features**:
  - Multilingual support (SK, EN, RU, UA, etc.).
  - Custom Admin Panels.
  - Integration with CRM and Email systems.
  - **Guarantee**: 6 months of free technical support.

### B. Advertising Campaigns (PPC)
*URL: /service/ads*

Contextual and Targeted advertising in Google and Meta ecosystems.
- **Google Ads**: Search, Display, Merchant Center (Shopping).
- **Meta Ads**: Facebook, Instagram, Threads, WhatsApp.
- **Process**:
  - Competitor Analysis & Math-based Budgeting.
  - Creative Design & Copywriting.
  - Continuous Optimization & Scaling.

### C. Telegram Bots & Automation
*URL: /service/telegram*

Custom Python-based bots to automate routine tasks.
- **Capabilities**:
  - Auto-posting listings to portals (e.g., Bazoš).
  - Order & Reservation Management.
  - Data Parsing & Competitor Monitoring.
  - Customer Support &Feedback loop.

### D. Web Analytics & Tracking
*URL: /service/analytics*

Advanced tracking setup to understand every user interaction.
- Server-Side Google Tag Manager (GTM).
- Google Analytics 4 (GA4) with custom events.
- Heatmaps (Microsoft Clarity / Yandex Metrica).

### E. Bug Fixing & Maintenance
*URL: /service/bugfix*

Rescue services for broken or slow websites.
- Fixing PHP/JS errors.
- Malware removal & Security hardening.
- Performance optimization (Core Web Vitals).

### F. Cookie Consent Mode V2
*URL: /service/cookies*

Legal compliance without monthly fees.
- Custom banner development.
- Full Google Consent Mode v2 integration.
- Ensuring data collection remains legal and effective.

---

## 3. Portfolio Highlights

- **Biliardovna**: Club website in Bratislava.
- **Studio Krasy**: Beauty salon with booking integration.
- **Top Sklad**: Warehouse rental service with complex space management.
- **Bodabo**: Wholesale e-shop for premium vanilla and coffee.

---

## 4. Pricing & Policies

- **Pricing Model**: Transparent project-based pricing or hourly rates (starting at €25-35/hr).
- **Payment Methods**: Invoice, Card, Crypto (USDT, BTC).
- **Support**: All developed projects come with a **6-month support guarantee**.

---
